title: Google Pixel 2XL stopped charging with Google charger.
content:
Google Pixel 2XL since Android 10 various issues with charging.
Would not work with brand new Google charger after 2 weeks, but charger works perfectly with Samsung S10.... reverted to bog standard phone charger with USB B to USB C cable, that had previously stopped working, now working.....after spending an age putting a Motorola G3 I had knocking around set up so I could send my Pixel 2XL under warranty, I noticed a security update for my Pixel, updated it and now my Google charger works again.....this is a PITA.
